answers.answer: My prayers are with you and your baby, I really hope everything goes ok with you two!! Keep us updated!
Btw, how was your blood pressure before? Did they find proteins in your urine? Just curious how they diagnose it.
Sending prayers ur way hun ..what were ur symptoms ?but I believe u wil be fine I had it with my son he is ok but I delivered at 34 weeks but he was great gd luck

Thanks for your prayers babydoll. I had bp problems at the beginning of my pregnancy ( never had issues before) but they put me on meds right away and its been under control. I also did  24 hr urine early on and it came back fine. Until my appointment Monday my bp was elevated and I was sent to OB assessment at the hospital. I was given magnesium through an IV and they collected my urine through a catheter for 24 hrs. The doc comes in this morning and tells me there was too much protein in my urine and I have preeclampsia :(
Thanks Lexus! That's very encouraging to hear.
Stay strong and positive. The doctors are very capable these days and they are monitoring you.All the best wishes for you, your family and your baby <3
Aww good luck. Keep positive. You and your baby will be fine.xx
Aww I'll keep you in my prayers I had my baby around that time and she was healthy!!!! Stay positive!!!!
I'm in the hospital as well for the same thing. Smh I was sent to the hospital after my docs app. Good luck to you.
Good luck hun. Prayers sent your way
Thanks Lizzie! Good luck to you too aniyahs_mommie. Looks like we're in the same boat.
Sending prayers up for the both of you ladies and your baby!

Oh ok, thank you for the info. I hope you are doing good today. That's gotta be hard to have to stay in the hospital that long!! I'm glad they caught it early enough though! Keep us updated on your progress, even though I don't know you, I still care. I want every ones baby and mothers to be ok! God be with you and your little one!
I pray the Lord see you through and guide you, I wish u a safe delivery!
Hope everything gets better, stay healthy mama
Praying all goes well for you and your baby.

question: Been at the hospital since Monday. I was promptly sent here after my doc appointment at 2:00PM. Just found out I have preeclampsia at 5:45AM and have to remain here for the next two weeks then they will deliver my baby early at 37 weeks. I'm 35weeks today. Please say a prayer or send positive thoughts my way. Thanks mamas.
title: preeclampsia :(
